reviews.review_msg: she pretend she cares, but she doesn't. She is the only person interested in the course and always come unprepared.

Marc is a really wholesome awesome guy, people give him a hard time because he is a little bit of a hard marker but that is it. He truly cares about his students and I for one really enjoyed having him!

He does not give feedback, feels threatened when students ask him questions and acquire a defensive posture.
It was a Leadership class for an MBA, with poor class content, a lack of inspirational managerial illustrative examples, and practical exercises. He dictated the Leadership class by repeating the textbook.

Marc is probably the nicest prof i have ever had. However, he gave no clear rubrics for assignemtns and said everything was based on our own learning. Which confused me since he gave everyone bad marks. I took this class as a GPA booster and it did not boost my gpa in any means. Do not take a course with him since he releases all marks at end

He's probably the nicest prof I've had. But his class was such a mess! We were always lost on what to do on our assignments, which he gave very broad instructions for and never gave any feedback. Gave us our marks for assignments at the very end not knowing how our progress was. Disappointing, considering how nice and friendly he was.
Sue's class was very engaging and enjoyable. She shared personal stories and allowed for lots of valuable discussion.
